POLARIX

Introduction

Pentor is a Thai singer and actor under Insight Entertainment. He was a member of the boy group LAZ1 and the trainee group Insight Rookies. He made his solo debut on March 31, 2023, with the digital single "Buzzkill." He is the oldest member of the upcoming Chinese-Korea boy group, POLARIX, formed through the survival show, Starlight Boys.
